thread.title: Speke Hotel is the wonderful place to feel like home..!
thread.title_full: Speke Hotel is the wonderful place to feel like home..! - Review of Speke Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Kishore K
title: Speke Hotel is the wonderful place to feel like home..!
text:
One of the best hotel in kampla, i have enjoyed while staying in speke... Thanks a lot to all speke staff for their good service. A big thanks to Mr. Bhupendra and his entire team for their excelent hospitality.
Thanks a lot to Mr. Mohanty who had told me about speke hotel.!
Best of luck guys, keep it up.!!!
Puri Jagannath Temple. No 4th Holi Place in india. Visit once for peace!!
